description: purchase of high resolution centrifuge gradient fractionator, gradient maker, gradient collector, and gradient profiler
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

| Classification                  | Details                            |
| :------------------------------- | :--------------------------------- |
| Tender Number | WS4388935424-Doc4399392940             |
| Solicitation Number | WS4388935424                  |
| Tender Closing Date | February 6, 2024, 2:00:00 PM EST  |
| Tender Status | Cancelled                          |

### Tender Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is issuing a cancelled tender for the supply of a high-resolution centrifuge gradient fractionator, gradient maker, gradient collector, and gradient profiler. The end-user entity is the CFIA.

### Tender Description

The CFIA requires a laboratory and scientific equipment that must meet the UNSPSC code *41100000. The tender method is competitive-open bidding with the lowest price as the primary selection criterion.

### Tender Documents and Contact Information

* Tender notice available at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18545315?extsite=MTg1NDUzMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18545315?extsite=MTg1NDUzMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Person: Melanie Perrin (SPAC/PSPC), melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* End User Entities: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0Y9, Canada

### Important Notes

* The tender closing date has been amended to February 6, 2024, 2:00:00 PM EST.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the amended closing time.
* Bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.

### Trade Agreements and Associations

This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) between the Canadian provinces. The end user entity is based in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The contract will be issued under the Procurement Category Gupteiroms, DWrecommendseriephas federal government.
